name: Tap Egg Break: Hardest Game to Crack
name_original: Tap Egg Break: Hardest Game to Crack
description:
Are you ready to get your game on? Well then, start your tapping! It's raining eggs and it's your job to make them disappear. Test your dexterity and finger skills by popping as many as you can before the time runs out. Of course, you want to be careful of the evil objects or else your game will be over!

It might sound easy, but you'll be addicted and challenged within seconds of playing. Watch quickly as the eggs speed up and fall faster and faster. Tap the screen to ""pop"" them and make them disappear but don't wait too long! Earn extra points along the way, too!

Fun for all ages with exciting graphics and vibrant colors, you won't want to put this one down. Challenge yourself over and over again until you pass all the levels.

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
